dcterms:creator: A. Shahroudy
J. Liu
T.-T. Ng
G. Wang
dcterms:description: A large-scale indoor dataset containing 56880 human action videos collected by three Kinect v2 cameras, consisting of 60 action classes, with benchmarks for cross-subject and cross-view recognition.
dcterms:title: NTU RGB+D 60

dcterms:creator: J. Liu
A. Shahroudy
M. L. Perez
G. Wang
L.-Y. Duan
A. K. Chichung
dcterms:description: The largest indoor skeleton-based action recognition dataset, containing 114480 videos performed by 106 subjects across 120 action classes, with benchmarks for cross-subject and cross-setup recognition.
dcterms:title: NTU RGB+D 120
